body: Ten officers in the elite Tactical Narcotics Team are under investigation after allegations were made that they mistreated prisoners and lied about evidence to shore up shaky arrests and justify illegal searches, high-ranking police officials said yesterday. title: 10 Detectives Face an Inquiry On False Data

body: A year ago, when Mary Grace Wynn moved from downtown Manhattan to Norwood, in the north Bronx, she saw it as a safe bet. While other city neighborhoods crumbled under shootings and drug abuse, turmoil in Norwood amounted to an outcry over the city's inadvertent hacking of 67 old maple trees that lined Mosholu Parkway. But in a six-week period,
title: Fear Moves Into a Quiet Neighborhood in the Bronx

body: LEAD: The huge space known as Building 294A at the Brooklyn Navy Yard industrial center has seen assorted ship builders and repairers come and go. body: LEAD: A dismembered body found near the Brooklyn Navy Yard has been tentatively identified as that of Mary Beal, 61 years old, of the Bronx, the police said yesterday. They said the body parts were found in two bags on Sept. 15, the day she was reported missing. Mrs. Beal, a Yugoslav immigrant and widow, had moved to the Norwood section in the
title: Dismembered Body Identified

body: LEAD: The section on environmental protection in Gov. Mario M. Cuomo's first State of the State message, in 1983, was barely a page long and included proposals to modernize fish hatcheries and build more boat launches. body: LEAD: Dr. C. Douglas Hoyt, a dentist who was the first medical officer to go ashore in the invasion of Guadalcanal in World War II, died on Friday at Monmouth Medical Center in Long Branch, N.J. title: Corrections

title: IDEAS & TREADS; TRYING TO SOLVE THE SIDE EFFECTS OF CONVERTING TRASH TO ENERGY

title: Asbestos Trust Fund Of Manville Queried

title: Lawyer Accused of Conflict In Asbestos Damage Cases

body: SCHILLIZZI'S hands are his work; he keeps his nails manicured and his fingers nimble with regular exercise. He is neither a pianist nor a masseur. He is a world champion safecracker.
